attributes.action: Make the Burning of the Union Jack illegal.
attributes.additional_details: This was brought up after a video circulating on Facebook of a man attempting to burn the Union Jacks on the War memorial. I believe that the burning of our Great flag is traitorous and directly going against this great nation.
attributes.background: This petition is to amend the Treason act to include the Burning of the Union Jack. This would apply to all British Realms.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545
